column1: #Text=Korra says : " I 'm locking you away for another ten thousand years , Vaatu ! "
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Do n't let them escape this time .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Are you this is the best way to find Jinora ?
#Text=" Dark Spider Spirit says : " You again ?!
#Text=" Kya says : " I thought we were gon na be taken to a prison ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " This is a prison .
#Text=" Dark Spider Spirit says : " Welcome to the Fog of Lost Souls .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " We are now one !
#Text=Now a new era for spirits and humans will begin !
#Text=And I will lead them all as the new Avatar !
#Text=" Korra says : " Well I 'm the old Avatar , and my era 's not over yet !
